description: FailureDomain represents the different configurations required to spread Machines across failure domains on different platforms.

aws.description: AWS configures failure domain information for the AWS platform.

items.description: AWSFailureDomain configures failure domain information for the AWS platform.

placement.description: AWSFailureDomainPlacement configures the placement information for the AWSFailureDomain.

availabilityZone.description: AvailabilityZone is the availability zone of the instance.

subnet.description: AWSResourceReference is a reference to a specific AWS resource by ID, ARN, or filters. Only one of ID, ARN or Filters may be specified. Specifying more than one will result in a validation error.

filters.description: Filters is a set of filters used to identify a resource.

items.description: AWSResourceFilter is a filter used to identify an AWS resource

name.description: Name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive.

values.description: Values includes one or more filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive.

type.description: Type determines how the reference will fetch the AWS resource.

azure.description: Azure configures failure domain information for the Azure platform.

items.description: AzureFailureDomain configures failure domain information for the Azure platform.

zone.description: Availability Zone for the virtual machine. If nil, the virtual machine should be deployed to no zone.

gcp.description: GCP configures failure domain information for the GCP platform.

items.description: GCPFailureDomain configures failure domain information for the GCP platform

zone.description: Zone is the zone in which the GCP machine provider will create the VM.

openstack.description: OpenStack configures failure domain information for the OpenStack platform.

items.description: OpenStackFailureDomain configures failure domain information for the OpenStack platform

availabilityZone.description: The availability zone from which to launch the server.

platform.description: Platform identifies the platform for which the FailureDomain represents. Currently supported values are AWS, Azure, GCP and OpenStack.
